title: The Corruption

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Corrupt someone during the day and kill at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The more living people who are corrupted, the stronger you are.
- You can corrupt Day 1.
- If a corrupted player dies during the night, your action is processed as if they were living ***unless*** they die before the night ends.

fields.name: Corruption Effects:
fields.value:
- 0 Corrupted: Basic Attack/Defense.
- 1 Corrupted: Powerful Attack + Roleblock Immunity.
- 2 Corrupted: Powerful Rampage Attack + Redirect Immunity.
- 3 Corrupted: People who visit corrupted players are corrupted + Control Immunity.
- 4 Corrupted: Unstoppable attack and Powerful defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: - Kill all who oppose the Corruption ***or*** see every living player corrupted (you can die once you see all living players corrupted).
